item.title: The command line isn't scary, its damn powerful.
item.author: w3dg@duck.com (Debopam Gupta)
item.description: Most people when starting out in their tech career tend to overlook the possibilities that command line offers. Here’s a guide from me on the what and why you should know to be decent at the command line.
